long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Novus is an AI-powered browser extension designed to help users identify potential scams. By allowing users to highlight suspicious messages, Novus rapidly analyzes the message context and provides clear warnings on how to proceed while browsing
